name: ada
readme:
# [ada](https://ada-url.com)@v3.3.0 [![Build and test library](https://github.com/zig-devel/ada/actions/workflows/library.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/zig-devel/ada/actions/workflows/library.yml)

WHATWG-compliant and fast URL parser written in modern C++

## Usage

Install library:

```sh
zig fetch --save https://github.com/zig-devel/ada/archive/refs/tags/3.3.0-0.tar.gz
```

Statically link with `mod` module:

```zig
const ada = b.dependency("ada", .{
    .target = target,
    .optimize = optimize,
});

mod.linkLibrary(ada.artifact("ada"));
```

owner_bio: An opinionated collection of C/C++ libraries builded by the Zig build system.
